entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming east 40 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 20.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Local amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High 20. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
